p: All CMIP5 model output are available from https://pcmdi.llnl.gov/search/cmip5. NSIDC sea ice satellite sea ice can be downloaded from http://nsidc.org/data/NSIDC-0051. NCEP/NCAR reanalysis data can be downloaded from http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/data/gridded/data.ncep.reanalysis.html. Other data and code are available from the authors on request.
